item.title: I was sitting on 150,000 credit card points — here's how I got past analysis paralysis to redeem a portion of them
item.description: Feeling "stuck" while trying to find a unicorn redemption is all too common. Here's how I push past this to make traveling more affordable and fun.

item.title: You can get a free cup of coffee at Holiday Inn Express hotels next weekend — even if you're not a guest
item.description: Holiday Inn Express is helping guests start their day off on the right foot by partnering with Costa Coffee to serve up a fresh cup of Joe to everyone...

item.title: Delta to Ibiza, Malta or Sardinia? SkyMiles members to vote for newest European route
item.description: Delta Air Lines is launching a "Route Race," allowing SkyMiles members to vote on the airline's next European destination: Malta, Ibiza or Sardinia.

item.title: Are we all (mostly) winners? My take on Alaska's new unified Atmos Rewards program
item.description: Alaska Airlines is out with its long-awaited new loyalty program, Atmos Rewards, which combines the former Mileage Plan and HawaiianMiles programs.

item.title: Alaska Airlines to outfit entire fleet with fast, free Starlink Wi-Fi service
item.description: Alaska Airlines is planning to equip its planes with Starlink Wi-Fi, and make the service free for members of its new Atmos Rewards program.
